text:
I just downloaded Tomcat 5.0.4 and tried to run the startup.exe file.  The 
standard c:\ sreen gave the following error:

SEVERE: Servlet.service() for servlet jsp threw exception
org.apache.jasper.JasperException
        at org.apache.jasper.servlet.JspServletWrapper.service(JspServletWrapper
.java:367)
        at org.apache.jasper.servlet.JspServlet.serviceJspFile(JspServlet.java:2
93)

The system then goes on for a bit and then "hangs".  A similar problem was 
occurring in the Tomcat "production" version, so I tried the 5.0.4 version to 
see if it would be fixed.

I'm using Windows 2000 Professional.

Thanks,

Jerry Hammannn
creator: jerrympls@hotmail.com
